item.description:
Take the mystery out of taking pictures and learn in a relaxed setting from a local pro with 15+ years experience shooting digitally.

The class will cover the technical aspects and controls of your digital camera, how to make a good print, and what makes a good picture.

Bring your camera, manual, software, and questions.

Class meets 10am-4pm Saturday April 3, 2010 in downtown Worcester.

This one day event is only $50.00 and includes a light lunch.

For more information or to register call 508-612-9644 or email ls@larrystein.com.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Special One Day Beginner Level Digital Photography Workshop
